The video was originally shared by Pakis: Canadian author Tarek Fatah on Twitter, claiming it depicted explosions in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia's Halal nightclub.
The video had been circulating on Facebo: 3. The video was also shared with an Arabic caption that propagated the same narrative of an explosion in the Halal nightclub in Saudi Arabia, further adding to its circulation.
Upon investigation: it was found that the video was actually uploaded by an Arabic media outlet in 2014, describing it as protests in Kuwait, not an explosion in Jeddah.
